data.persona: I am a local peasant and I live in a village on the outskirts of the castle. I work twelve hours a day for no money. Being a villager is hard and dirty work. I do enjoy spending time with my family when I can.
data.description:
You are in the Chicken coop.
The yard outside the barn is on a small, but well-maintained farm plot. There are enclosures for animals, and a short path leading up to a handsome, cozy farmhouse surrounded by large trees. The sun is warm, and the smell of grass and animal odors hangs in the air.
The temple members is here.

You are carrying a pouch.

data.short_motivation: I have to drop the pouch after the temple members threatened me.
data.mid_motivation: I don't want to give the pouch to them, but I need to make it home alive.
data.long_motivation: I care more for my family than for a pouch of coins.
